Install with Bower - Recommended

You can also install and manage Sass, CSS, JavaScript, and fonts using Bower:

{% highlight bash %}$ bower install --save {{ site.repo }}#{{ site.current_version }}{% endhighlight %}

Then in your application main scss file, import library scss files:

{% highlight bash %} // ng-cloak @import "../../../bower_components/tecnotree-ui-library/dist/sass/angular-csp.scss"; // font path $icon-font-path: "../bower_components/bootstrap-sass-official/assets/fonts/bootstrap/"; // image path $img-path: "../bower_components/tecnotree-ui-library/dist/images/"; @import "../../../bower_components/tecnotree-ui-library/dist/sass/tecnotree-ui-library-custom-variables.scss"; @import "../../../bower_components/tecnotree-ui-library/dist/sass/tecnotree-ui-library-components.scss"; {% endhighlight %}
